items.title: Semgrep to Opengrep migration – February 2026
items.content_html: As we previously discussed on our blog, there have been licensing changes to Semgrep, and Opengrep has emerged as an open-source fork of the Semgrep engine. To ensure your continued access to the existing patterns we have switched to Opengrep.
